Parallel Iteration

Member types const_range_type and range_type of template classes concurrent_set and concurrent_multiset model the Container Range concept. The types differ only in that the bounds for a const_range_type are of type const_iterator, whereas the bounds for a range_type are of type iterator.

The following table provides information on the members of concurrent_set and concurrent_multiset template classes.
Member Description
const_range_type range() const

Returns: const_range_type object representing all items in the set.

range_type range()

Returns: range_type object representing all items in the set.
